comments.body: With the `nullable` Protocol Name, the code generator generates unreachable condition. I have added an exception for the time being and will address this in a follow up PR if you don't mind. It does not impact the behaviour of this PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +228,232 @@        <Bug pattern="UC_USELESS_CONDITION"/>
    </Match>

    <Match>
        <!-- Suppress warnings about ignoring the return value of await.
